purpose: Facilitate controlled and purposeful generative AI conversations in customer service and compliance contexts.
principle: Builds on LLMs with mechanisms for conversation control and compliance to ensure predictability and alignment with user goals.
reusability: Offers API support for integration into existing systems, allowing for customization and extension of conversation capabilities.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited features and stability; primarily focused on English language support.
name: parlant
description: Parlant is the open-source engine for controlled, compliant, and purposeful generative AI conversations. It gives you the power of LLMs without the unpredictability.
highlight: Enables controlled and compliant generative AI conversations with reduced unpredictability of LLMs.
